mapper.select: select case when count(member_id)>0 then 1 else 0 end result from membership where member_id=#{member_id} and state != 3 and state !=2
select case when count(member_id)>0 then 1 else 0 end result from membership where member_id=#{member_id} and state != 3 and state !=2
select case when count(member_id)>0 then 1 else 0 end result from membership where member_id = #{member_id} and pwd = #{pwd} and state != 3 and state !=2
mapper.insert: insert into membership(member_id, email, member_name, mDate, state,nickName, pwd, phone) values(#{member_id}, #{email},#{member_name},sysdate,1,#{nickName},#{pwd},#{phone})
